response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and the unparalleled craftsmanship involved, we believe it's worth more than its face value. We are offering this remarkable piece to you for $15,000. This price reflects the true value of the product and the opportunity to own a masterpiece. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
